name: ShoutRanger
description:
Hi everyone,

This is a easy game and published for https://itch.io/jam/i-cant-draw-but-want-to-make-a-game-again.

I very enjoy the jam process and make this game.

+Target+

Play the one of ranger fighter, control your robot to fight against monster.

+Control+

Z, X, C and V on keyboard, each of them present a skill for robot.

Some skill can move, strong power shoot, or special ability.

+Shout+

I have no time to implement the shout system.

If you win the monster at the beach, you can try to shout out.
